name: PLOS Author Contributions
tagline: Text-mining and analyzing author contributions in PLOS articles
body:
### PLOS Author Contributions

This was the result of a [Hack4ac](http://hack4ac.com/) team working to mine article data from the [PLOS Search API](http://api.plos.org/) and PeerJ for detailed author contributions.

Several aspects were developed simultaneously:

* A [PeerJ](https://peerj.com/) integration to pull author contribution information;
* A PLOS API bridge that queries the PLOS API, enriches it with author contribution information and converts it to CSV on the fly;
* An purely [R](http://www.r-project.org/)-based implementation of mining PLOS and subsequent analysis.
